caption: (Translated by Google) Tasty but overpriced.  (Original) Lecker aber überteuert.
GOOD SERVICE

Small juice bar and smoothie shop that specializes in natural juices, acai bowls and fruit smoothies. Many fresh and clean items on the menu. I'm not downtown as often as I used to be, but I'm always happy to see that urban development hasn't swallowed these guys.
(Translated by Google) The inside of the store is clean and the taste is good  (Original) 매장 내부가 깔끔하고 맛도 괜찮아요
Love this location of the juice shop. The workers are always helpful and never gives me any trouble when I need to redeem my copouns
Its was okay

Customer Service-very poor experience ordering from them on Uber Eats--it wasn't Eats' fault either. They were out of what I ordered (after I was able to successfully place order). Instead of calling me to let me know-perhaps to order something different, they kept the order. The courier arrived and was waiting to deliver the food, I was waiting to receive the food. My girlfriend (she ordered) messaged the courier to see what the hold up was after an 1 hour and 10 minutes - they said they were waiting. I then called the restaurant and asked them - they responded by saying "we're out of what you ordered."  Incredibly poor communication on their end - I know Uber Eats allows them to contact folks for situations exactly like this. They didn't proactively reach out or cancel the order either - if they were out of something and had no intention of reaching out to see if I wanted to exchange something, why wait to cancel the order? They kept both me and the courier waiting. I reached out to management to provide honest feedback - ensure their staff knows how to use 3rd delivery platforms to avoid situations like this in the future-never heard from them.  Never got to try the food, the shop was closed shortly after speaking with a representative from the restaurant. Two stars since they did end up cancelling the order - but only after I called and waited 1 hr and 10 min. Again, if they didn't make the order because they didn't have the food, confused why they didn't just cancel the order right there and then. The food looked good, but honestly, plenty of other juice/healthy food bars around Brooklyn.
Excellent.
Love their chicken salad, made without mayo!

This place used to be good when it first opened. Now I cant figure out how to describe the taste of the food, compare to the lack of food given for a higher price, and the shrinking of the shop's space. If you want money's worth with the same nutritional benefits, spend it elsewhere. Stay away from the Poke bowl, the plain soy sauce they put over the rice will give you high blood pressure.

I love this place 😍 They have so many different juices to choose from, which are all delicious even the juices that aren't supposed to be sweet, I've tried nine of them so far 💖 I also decided to order a smoothie once and was pleased as they don't use ice as a filler ingredient yay🥳 so the smoothies are worth the price and are delicious also 😋 I also witnessed what I would consider a budda bowl being prepared and they looked good as well.

Went here at 7:30 on a Sunday not realizing they close at 8 to rap music blaring and everything shut down... I get you wanna leave but maybe that's alittle too early? I was told only "fridge items" were available which was basically just premade bottles.
I love the juices and their menu of bowl variety are awesome too.
I really like it here. Staff is almost always super friendly, prices are good, and food is good. Very conveniently located as well. I like when I remember to come here for a quick lunch

Staff is slow, we ordered 2 shakes and thought they forgot about us. Shakes are way too expensive, especially when there is a Hawa down the street. But i guess that is going to be the norm in NYC with the $15 min wage increase - pass it down to the customer.

(Translated by Google) Tastiest cold pressed juices and plain breakfast bowls! Dear staff! The shiitake avocado bread is freshly prepared behind a glass and tastes divine. On request, all meals are also personally coordinated. Highly Recommended! More of that!  (Original) Leckerste cold pressed Säfte und schlichte Frühstück-Bowls! Liebes Personal! Das Shiitake-Avocado-Brot wird hinter einer Glasscheibe frisch zubereitet und schmeckt göttlich. Auf Wunsch werden alle Speisen auch persönlich abgestimmt. Absolut empfehlenswert! Mehr davon!
(Translated by Google) Kind  (Original) Nett
Bowls and juices are great but service is very slow at lunch time
awesome

I love this place.. Great salads, plus dressings.. and smoothies.. but make sure the new employees know how to fill a bowl of greens with fixings.   If  I get another bowl with 1/2 the amount of greens that are suppose to be in it and I'm paying  $15 for a salad lunch.. I'm bringing it back and raising eyebrows on the spot..  Being cheap does not repeat return  customer business.

If you know me you know that I am obsessed with oranges (especially blood orange). This juice is exactly what I needed to bring me back to life. It was delicious. The staff were super nice and helpful. Definitely not something I would get everyday, but it was a great serving and I loved the bottle so much I decided to take a picture of it. Will be back!
Absolutely loved this👌
Other than the price, the smoothies are worth it, the don't slack on the amount of each individual ingredient they add.
The lady behind the counter was amazing! She helped me get rid of my cold! 😊
Take my money
Their Israeli salad plate is pretty decent. Also, can try the fresh juices / shakes

I’m legit sitting here at the moment and can’t help but write a review. Super nice people, clean place. I had an açaí bowl and it was perfect. Customer service is out of this world. Felt very welcomed and satisfied with the service. Shout out to the employee with hair locks 🙌🏼  mad nice and hospitable. I would recommend anyone to go here whenever they can. I’m very picky with where I eat. Places have to be clean and I have to feel a sense of respect when I’m there. Some restaurants treat you like another number, or they rush through your order without care and making sure things are done in order and in a sanitary area. This juice shop hit all those key points. I felt comfortable and safe eating my açaí bowl. Didn’t have to question if the fruits were washed or fresh or not cuz you can just see it when you come in. Whoever is in charge should legit give the two employees here a raise cuz some bosses can be trash sometimes. But I hope this place is run by someone with as much cleanliness, care and integrity as their shop portrays. That is all. To anyone reading this....ever...just come to this shop lol

Staff was great! Place is always clean and I'm always treated with a smile. I've been coming here for about a year so it's just not one visit. If you want to eat healthy and somewhat affordable come here. Peace!!

Loved this Açaí Coco Kale Bowl!  But I don’t get why you get all this nice „healthy lifestyle food“ plastic packed, also with plastic cutlery, even if you are eating there?!? Why??? . . . . More information and ideas for a healthy, active and sustainable lifestyle on Instagram @m.i.s.s.i.o.n.you

Thoroughly disgusted with the service at this location.  I approached the counter to order the employees attitude was a bit discouraging to begin with but she's human, it's Saturday so I gave her the benefit of the doubt, ordered my  smoothie and mushroom avocado toast as well as purchased three juices. My husband and I sat aside while we waited for our order. We could see that there were a few people before us so we definitely knew patience would be key in this situation.  Sitting and waiting for about 15 mins, I notice similar orders being made that looked like what we ordered. But each one was handed off to someone else. We noticed the faces around us changing and then realized that people who had come in after us were being served. Again I see an order just like mine being made so I walk over it's handed to someone else. As I'm going to say something to the  cashier/food preparer she begins to ask me what did I order again. "You can't be serious!"  Not only did you see me sitting there, you actually don't even have record of my order. An entire 40 minutes had passed. All with my husband and I being patient and this woman has the nerve to ask what I ordered again. Everyone else that walked in and waited had their order ticket taken care of.  I tell her my order she begins to attempt to make it but still with this nasty attitude. I ask for a refund, her response "OK Cool." DEFINITELY NOT COOL MORON. She was unapologetic and very dismissive. I stood at the register waiting for my order. If it weren't  enough blatant disrespect already displayed, she then attempts to take someone else's order over me, before she issues my refund. I politely tell her "that's rude, don't take an order over me before you're finished dealing with the situation at hand."  She had to then call her manager via her cell phone to ask how to issue a refund. The customer asked me how long I was waiting and for what, I told him and he left. Rightfully so. This place use to be a favorite and super convenient but has gone to the dogs. NOTE TO CORPORATE: DO NOT LEAVE UNRELIABLE UNPROFESSIONAL AND INCAPABLE STAFF TO HANDLE A SMALL SHOP LIKE THIS ON ANY DAY ESPECIALLY NOT A SATURDAY!  I hate that I've had to result to a bad review as my first review ever. But this was a moment of outright disrespect and lack of accountability. Won't be going to any other Juice Shop again.
The employee that works the register there is super nice, helpful,  and professional. In addition, the food is good, just a tad bit expensive.
Spectacular juices, but a little bit expensive
Pricey, but quality food & good customer service. My only complaint is the lack of AC, in summer months.
A little pricey
I generally get the Acai bowls here and they are awesome. Salads are pretty great too. Worth a stop if you are close by and want something healthy.
Poor selection of salad ingredients.  Overcharged my credit card.
Couldn't be better!
It was one of the most delicous salad I have ever eatten
Good juice, good salad, good bowls, good service, good atmosphere. Best juice and healthiest place for lunch in the area.
(Translated by Google) N / a  (Original) N/a
It's good healthy options. Prices are a little pricey but not outrageous.
Prices r reasonable and the staff is very friendly...
Not so fresh rice and poke bowls after 6pm
Smoothies are 👌🏾👌🏾

I usually come here a lot in the past. So I came back today to get a smoothie. I am extremely disappointed with their service. I order a drink and gave them my name and I was sitting down waiting for my drink. They had 6 + workers and they were all making samples and drinks for their friends. I am a PAYING customer, they need to re-evaluate their priorities. They need to first assist PAYING customers, not their friends or some free samples. I waited 10 mins and I went back to the cashier named “Wendy”, Hispanic-looking lady. I asked her where my drink was, she was extremely rude and said they called my name and walked away with no apology and she had an attitude.I would have let it go if I got an apology on the spot. None of the staff wanted to give me the rude cashier’s name and the cashier was hiding in the corner. I had to get the name from the manager. I was sitting there for ten minutes waiting for my drink and no one called my name. What got me extremely angry is they handed drinks out to their “friends” and customers after me.  They need better organization and workflow and better customer service.
Love the food here

I went to the Juice Shop and it was extremely to loud do to the music. I got the Spicy Lady Smoothie and I didn’t like it at all, The Açaí bowls tasted just like bananas. It is very over priced and I wouldn’t recommend going.

I ordered a cleanse from the Brooklyn store this morning and still haven't received it. I've called the store many times and no one has answered. I've called two other stores, one of which offered to help but then stopped answering my calls. I can't request a refund through your app because it won't allow me to. Walked to the store and the employees were so dismissive and unhelpful. Horrible experience.

I really liked this place about a year or two ago and would go there pretty frequently but they have since changed the menu. They now sell poke bowls which I was not too crazy about.. My fav thing to eat here was the meals in the bowl but since they no longer make them with salmon its not the same to me.
Speedy and Friendly Customer Service

Delicious, healthy options. The lunch line is a bit long but the quality and freshness of the food makes it worth the wait. They serve good portions and birth my friend and I were satisfied with our meals.  I love the poke bowls!
The açaí bowl was tasty and refreshing. The also offer poke bowls, smoothies and toast. On the side the you can also choose bottled juices, salads, water, and small concoctions.
The açaí bowl was tasty and refreshing. The also offer poke bowls, smoothies and toast. On the side the you can also choose bottled juices, salads, water, and small concoctions. Limited seating.
Expensive but very good

Beyond Disappointing. Went in with a friend who treated me to my favorite Mediterranean Kale Bowl with Chicken. When I got back to my apt the salad tasted of tuna. I walked back to the store and was promptly asked by the cashier (who at this time happened to be the manager and not shift supervisor as she stated) what was wrong. I informed her that I order a chicken kale bowl and this had tuna. Maybe I got someone else order. She never tried the salad in front of me. All she told me was that our "tuna" doesn't look like this. I said ok, well somehow tuna was in my salad. Maybe it was from the tongs, the bucket, or just the wrong salad. Can you just make me the correct salad. She then went on with well it's going to be just like that so do you want a refund. I remind her again that my friend paid for lunch and wasn't sure if he paid cash or card. This is when Rasheda (the "Manager") dismiss me and said well we can only give a refund to your friend, there nothing I can do for you, leave before I call the cops to have you removed. All of this happened in front of all of her staff, who instead of directing them to work as there was now a line of 6 people waiting. I asked her for her name, emp ID or a number to corp. She never gave it too me, I had to get her name from another employee.  The service at this store by the manager (Rasheda Andrews) is horrendous! She also yells at her staff in public (witness the day before as she was scolding her male employee over a previous customer complaint) by the door while she was sitting directly across from a customer who was trying to enjoy their lunch.  What has happened to this location? I never got my refund or my salad.
I had the Summer Dew! Pretty upset they only offered it in one size! Even though I was waiting for ten minutes just get one smoothie I enjoyed it!
Good choice if gealthy food!

So far, I have not had anything I don't like. The kale bowls are awesome! I've had the Baja Verde, Mediterranean and the Spice Market. The bowl actually serves me for 2 meals so it's worth the cost. Chicken, tofu and chicken are extra. The roasted cauliflower salad is delicious. I have not had the smoothies.
Great variety of healthy options. I have tried the Coco-kale acai bowl & Spicy Lady smoothie. Bill and Britney provided excellent service. I wish I lived in the area to visit daily
Hit or miss depending on the staff. I've had amazing, prompt service. I've also been left waiting 5+ minutes before staff noticed I was trying to order.
Yummy, fresh and healthy options! My favorite lunch spot. Everyone that works there is always so pleasant too! (Fyi this place is NOT permanently closed.. not sure why google is reporting such)
Mr almond. Granola bowls are good too. Great for a snack.
Good healthy food and good service
